entities.name: Harry Potter
entities.description: A fourteen-year-old wizard and Hogwarts student who is unwillingly entered into the Triwizard Tournament and witnesses the return of Lord Voldemort.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 4 - Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire.epub
harry_potter_section_03.txt

entities.name: Lord Voldemort

attributes.appearance: whiter than a skull, wide livid scarlet eyes, flat nose with slits

entities.description: The Dark Wizard who regains his physical body and power through a dark ritual using Harry Potter's blood.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 4 - Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire.epub
harry_potter_section_03.txt

entities.name: Peter Pettigrew
entities.description: A servant of Lord Voldemort who aids in his resurrection by sacrificing his own hand.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 4 - Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire.epub
harry_potter_section_03.txt

entities.name: Frank Bryce
entities.description: The elderly gardener of the Riddle House who is murdered by Voldemort after overhearing his plans.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 4 - Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire.epub
harry_potter_section_03.txt

entities.name: Cedric Diggory
entities.description: A Hogwarts student and Triwizard Champion who is murdered by Peter Pettigrew in the Little Hangleton graveyard.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 4 - Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire.epub
harry_potter_section_03.txt

entities.name: Barty Crouch Jr.
entities.description: A Death Eater who escapes Azkaban, imprisons Alastor Moody, and impersonates him at Hogwarts to manipulate the Triwizard Tournament.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 4 - Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire.epub
harry_potter_section_03.txt

entities.name: Barty Crouch Sr.

attributes.occupation: Head of the Department of International Magical Cooperation

entities.description: A high-ranking Ministry official who is killed by his own son after escaping house arrest.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 4 - Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire.epub
harry_potter_section_03.txt

entities.name: Alastor Moody
entities.description: A famous Auror hired to teach Defense Against the Dark Arts, but who is imprisoned in his own trunk for most of the year.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 4 - Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire.epub
harry_potter_section_03.txt

entities.name: Rita Skeeter
entities.description: A sensationalist reporter for the Daily Prophet who writes defamatory articles about Harry and his friends.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 4 - Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire.epub
harry_potter_section_03.txt

entities.name: Winky
entities.description: A house-elf dismissed by Barty Crouch Sr. who later works in the Hogwarts kitchens.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 4 - Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire.epub
harry_potter_section_03.txt

entities.name: Triwizard Tournament
entities.description: A magical competition between three wizarding schools involving three dangerous tasks.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 4 - Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire.epub
harry_potter_section_03.txt

entities.name: Little Hangleton Graveyard

attributes.significance: Burial place of the Riddle family

entities.description: The location where the Triwizard Cup transports Harry and Cedric, and where Voldemort is restored.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 4 - Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire.epub
harry_potter_section_03.txt

entities.name: The Dark Mark

attributes.symbol: Skull with a snake protruding from its mouth

entities.description: The symbol of Lord Voldemort, conjured in the sky at the Quidditch World Cup and branded on the arms of Death Eaters.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 4 - Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire.epub
harry_potter_section_03.txt

entities.name: S.P.E.W.
aliases: Society for the Promotion of Elfish Welfare
entities.description: An organization founded by Hermione Granger to campaign for the rights of house-elves.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 4 - Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire.epub
harry_potter_section_03.txt

relationships.description: Voldemort kills Frank Bryce with the Killing Curse after Frank overhears his plans.
relationships.evidence: There was a flash of green light, a rushing sound, and Frank Bryce crumpled. He was dead before he hit the floor.

relationships.description: Peter Pettigrew kills Cedric Diggory on Voldemort's orders.
relationships.evidence: A swishing noise and a second voice, which screeched the words to the night: 'Avada Kedavra!' ... Cedric was lying spread-eagled on the ground beside him. He was dead.

relationships.description: Barty Crouch Jr. confesses to killing his father.
relationships.evidence: I killed my father... Transfigured my father's body. He became a bone ... I buried it

relationships.description: Harry competes as the fourth champion in the Triwizard Tournament.
relationships.evidence: Harry Potter is the fourth Triwizard champion.

relationships.description: Harry duels Voldemort in the graveyard.
relationships.evidence: Voldemort raised his wand, and before Harry could do anything to defend himself... he had been hit again by the Cruciatus Curse.

relationships.description: Barty Crouch Jr. is revealed as a faithful servant of Voldemort.
relationships.evidence: I will be his dearest, his closest supporter ... closer than a son.

relationships.description: Hermione founds the Society for the Promotion of Elfish Welfare.
relationships.evidence: It's S-P-E-W. Stands for the Society for the Promotion of Elfish Welfare.

relationships.description: Harry is transported to the graveyard via Portkey.
relationships.evidence: They were standing instead in a dark and overgrown graveyard...

schema_proposals.name: impersonates
schema_proposals.description: Indicates that one character is disguising themselves as another (e.g., using Polyjuice Potion).
